title: Christine McGuinness voices her fears over her husband Paddy hosting Top Gear
text:

Christine McGuinness has admitted she worries about her husband Paddy doing Top Gear.

Take Me Out star Paddy took over hosting the show alongside Freddie Flintoff and Chris Harris, 44, in 2018.

His wife Christine, 31, told the Mirror: “I do worry about him.

“When he got it [the job] my first thought was, ‘Oh my god, I really hope he’s sensible’, because obviously I want him to be careful.”

Speaking at the Best Heroes Awards in Central London, Real Housewives of Cheshire Christine added. “I tell him not to go too fast.

(Image: PA)

“He’s pretty good at driving. We’ve usually got the kids with us. He’s very sensible, but when he’s on the show he goes back to being a boy in a car. He loves it. It’s his dream job.”

And Christine – who shares twins Penelope and Leo, six, and Felicity, three, with Paddy – has reasons to be fearful.

(Image: BBC)

Ex-cricketer Freddie, 41, has already had two accidents on the show.

And former Top Gear host Richard Hammond, 49, was in a coma for two weeks after a 288mph crash in 2006.
description: Christine has expressed her fears over her husband Paddy taking on the hosting duties for Top Gear
